Description.Text: Set in a prime location of Dubai, Ambassador Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out. Wake-up service, private pool, non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating can be found in selected guestrooms. Take a break from a long day and make use of outdoor pool. Ambassador Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Dubai or to simply relax and rejuvenate.
